title: Today only – B&H offering up to $850 off Snapdragon Copilot+ laptops: Microsoft Surface, ASUS Vivobook, more
description: Today only, as part of its daily Deal Zone offers, B&H is offering a handful of Snapdragon-powered Copilot+ laptops from Microsoft and ASUS at solid prices. You can save up to $850 by cashing in on these deals, and the prices for some of the machines start as…
